item.title: Hello SOFAStack!
item.description: SOFAStackâ„¢ (Scalable Open Financial Architecture Stack) is a collection of cloud native middleware components, which are designed to build distributed systems with high performance and reliability, and have been fully validated by mission-critical financial business scenarios. Links Home Page: https://www.sofastack.tech Source Code: https://github.com/sofastack Projects SOFABoot is a development framework open sourced by Ant Financial which is based on Spring Boot, provides capabilities such as Readiness Check, class isolation, log space isolation and asynchronous initialization of bean.
